title: Za'atar spiced lentil soup
directions: saute vegetables in oil in large pot until tender
add water, crushed tomatoes, lentils and salt. Bring to a boil, cover, reduce heat and simmer for 15 miinutes
stir in spinach and cook until wilted, about 1 minute
add lemon juice, hot sauce and more salt if needed
ladle into soup bowls and add a dollop of yogurt, a drizzle of olove oil and a sprinkle of za'atar
ingredients: 1 each carrot, onion, celery stalk diced
2 Tbsp lemon juice or red wine vinegar
